siteTitle: JungleCode - AI Market Entry Strategy for Japan

hero.title: Japan Success Starts Here
hero.subtitle: Access Japan's $9 trillion economy with proven market strategies and local expertise.

about.title: Your AI Vision Lands Here
about.description: JungleCode delivers strategic market insights based on real-world experience. We bridge cultural gaps, business practices, and legal frameworks for your AI success in Japan. Move forward with clarity and momentum at any stage of your market journey.

mission.title: Our Purpose
mission.text: To power AI growth in Japan through contextual understanding and dedicated partnership.

keyPoints.title: Strategic Guidance
keyPoints.description: We adapt to your market readiness.

keyPoints.title: Trusted Access
keyPoints.description: We connect you with key decision-makers.

challenges.title: Challenges We Solve
challenges.intro: Japan presents unique market barriers—from cautious buyers to complex regulations and nuanced communication. We break through each obstacle with local knowledge and actionable solutions.

challenges.title: Market Intelligence
challenges.challenge: It's hard to know what's working — or even who to talk to.
challenges.solution: We help you understand how the market works and where your opportunity actually lies.

challenges.title: Relationship Access
challenges.challenge: No matter how great your offering is, cold starts rarely go anywhere.
challenges.solution: We bring you into trusted conversations that lead to real traction.

challenges.title: Protocol Mastery
challenges.challenge: Even small things — like silence or seating — carry meaning here.
challenges.solution: We coach you on the unspoken rules that build confidence and trust.

challenges.title: Communication Precision
challenges.challenge: Overexplaining can come off as insecure or pushy.
challenges.solution: We help you strike the right balance — clear, calm, and intentional.

challenges.title: Compliance Clarity
challenges.challenge: The rules aren't always obvious — until they stop your momentum.
challenges.solution: We give you clarity early, so you can move forward without worry.

challenges.title: Trust Building
challenges.challenge: Japan expects more than just a good product — they expect reliability.
challenges.solution: We help you show you're serious — and build the kind of trust that lasts.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We deliver results at every stage of your Japan journey—from market planning to partnerships and growth.

primary.title: Market Strategy
primary.description: We create your clear path forward—building a foundation that respects market realities and accelerates growth.
features: Clarity on what Japan really needs
Strategy grounded in timing and context

secondary.title: Market Access

secondary.title: Market Adaptation
secondary.description: We align your offering with local expectations in tone, format, and trust signals.

steps.title: Market Discovery
steps.description: We assess your AI solution and determine Japan market fit.

steps.title: Growth Acceleration

whyJapan.title: Why Japan Matters Now
whyJapan.intro: Japan offers a structured, innovation-hungry economy with the trust frameworks and technology appetite that drive market expansion success.

sections.title: Market Opportunity
items: $9T economy with deep investments in automation and productivity
Large enterprise sector seeking scalable, long-term solutions
Strong alignment between public policy and innovation
Tech-savvy buyers who demand precision and trust
Strategic entry point for expansion across Asia

sections.title: Strategic Advantages
items: High IP protection and low tolerance for bad actors
Government support for AI-driven transformation
Reliable, modern infrastructure across industries
High brand loyalty for trusted partners
Premium pricing accepted for proven performance

sections.title: Success Requirements
items: Long-term partnerships built on credibility
High standards for transparency and reliability
Deep respect for quality, ethics, and craft
Preference for structured onboarding and integration
Clear expectations for support, compliance, and continuity

getStarted.title: Start Your Japan Journey
getStarted.subtitle: Take decisive action toward Japan market entry with experienced local guidance.

consultationSteps.title: Strategy Call
items: Understand your objectives and entry motivation
Assess market timing and strategic alignment
Identify major risks and blockers
Outline our working model

consultationSteps.title: Market Assessment
items: Evaluate possible entry pathways
Estimate resources and internal readiness
Map your positioning and messaging
Share early recommendations

consultationSteps.title: Action Plan
items: Provide a structured roadmap
Detail services, scope, and timelines
Align on investment and team fit
Set the foundation for launch

contact.title: Get Your Japan Strategy
contact.subtitle: Tell us your goals and timeline. Receive a targeted action plan within 48 hours.

team.name: Jet Villegas
team.bio: Global engineering leader with 6+ years directing operations from Tokyo. Built technology reaching billions worldwide, from browser platforms to job advertising systems. Delivers actionable AI insights for Japan market success.

team.name: Aditya Pandya
team.bio: Product leader with 5+ years in Japan who scaled global platform to 2.1B annual applications. Built products reaching 100M+ people generating $6B+ revenue. Delivers proven AI product strategies for Japanese market entry.
